net.corda.flows

Class NotaryFlow.Client

  • FlowLogic
    • net.corda.flows.NotaryFlow.Client
  • Enclosing class:
    NotaryFlow

    public static class NotaryFlow.Client
extends FlowLogic

    A flow to be used by a party for obtaining signature(s) from a NotaryService ascertaining the transaction timestamp is correct and none of its inputs have been used in another completed transaction.

    In case of a single-node or Raft notary, the flow will return a single signature. For the BFT notary multiple signatures will be returned â€“ one from each replica that accepted the input state commit.

    See Also:
    NotaryService

      ProgressTracker getProgressTracker()
      Override this to provide a class ProgressTracker. If one is provided and stepped, the framework will do something helpful with the progress reports. If this flow is invoked as a subflow of another, then the tracker will be made a child of the current step in the parent. If it's null, this flow doesn't track progress.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(SignedTransaction stx,
              ProgressTracker progressTracker)

        A flow to be used by a party for obtaining signature(s) from a NotaryService ascertaining the transaction timestamp is correct and none of its inputs have been used in another completed transaction.

        In case of a single-node or Raft notary, the flow will return a single signature. For the BFT notary multiple signatures will be returned â€“ one from each replica that accepted the input state commit.

        Parameters:
        progressTracker -

        Override this to provide a class ProgressTracker. If one is provided and stepped, the framework will do something helpful with the progress reports. If this flow is invoked as a subflow of another, then the tracker will be made a child of the current step in the parent. If it's null, this flow doesn't track progress.

        Note that this has to return a tracker before the flow is invoked. You can't change your mind half way through.

        Throws:
        - in case the any of the inputs to the transaction have been consumed by another transaction or the timestamp is invalid.
        See Also:
        NotaryService

        public Client(SignedTransaction stx)

      • getProgressTracker

        public ProgressTracker getProgressTracker()

        Override this to provide a class ProgressTracker. If one is provided and stepped, the framework will do something helpful with the progress reports. If this flow is invoked as a subflow of another, then the tracker will be made a child of the current step in the parent. If it's null, this flow doesn't track progress.

        Note that this has to return a tracker before the flow is invoked. You can't change your mind half way through.

        See Also:
        class ProgressTracker
